data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for 16/07/2025
data.news_body:
Ishan Dyes And Chemicals Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 16/07/2025 inter alia to consider and approve 1. To consider raising of funds through issue of Equity Shares Warrants or such other Securities which may or may not be Convertible into Equity Shares of the Company or any other eligible Securities on a preferential / rights or any other permissible mode / and / or combination thereof as may be considered appropriate and deem fit in the interest of the Company subject to applicable law and requisite approvals including approval of the Shareholders of the Company Government / Regulatory / Statutory approvals as may be applicable. 

2. To consider Increase in Authorized Share Capital of the Company and consequential Amendment in the Capital Clause of the Memorandum of Association of the Company subject to applicable law and requisite approvals including approval of the Shareholders of the Company Government / Regulatory / Statutory approvals as may be applicable.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for 12/02/2024
data.news_body: In continuation of our letter dated 05th February 2024 and Pursuant to the Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosures Requirements) Regulations, 2015 as amended from time to time, we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e. Monday, 12th February 2024 have inter alia considered and approved the matters as per enclosed disclosure.

data.caption: Audited Standalone Financial Results Of The Company For The Fourth Quarter And The Financial Year Ended 31St March, 2023.
data.news_body: Approved the Audited Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the Fourth Quarter and the Financial Year ended 31st March, 2023 along with Auditors' Report issued by the Statutory Auditors M/s A. R. Sulakhe & Co., Chartered Accountants (FRN: 110540W) which have been duly reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee.

data.caption: Financial Results For 31/12/2022.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosures Requirements) Regulations, 2015 as amended from time to time, we wish to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e. Tuesday, February 14, 2023 has considered and approved inter alia the following matters:

Approved the Un-Audited Standalone Financial Results along with the Limited Review Report issued by the Statutory Auditors M/s A R Sulakhe & Co, Chartered Accountants (FRN: 11054W) for the Quarter and Nine Months period ended December 31, 2022 which was also duly reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions - 30/09/2022.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the Listing Regulations, we are submitting herewith disclosure of Related Party Transactions for the half year period ended September 30, 2022, on consolidated basis, in the format specified by the SEBI vide circular SEBI/HO/CFD/CMD1/CIR/P/2021/662 dated November 22, 2021.

data.caption: Financial Results For Quarter And Half Year Ended 30/09/2022.
data.news_body: Un-Audited Standalone Financial Results for the Quarter and Half Year ended 30th September, 2022 along with the Limited Review Report issued by the Statutory Auditors M/s A R Sulakhe & Company, Chartered Accountants (FRN - 110540W), which have been duly reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for 14/11/2022.
data.news_body: Pursuant to the Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosures Requirements) Regulations, 2015 as amended from time to time, we wish to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e. Monday, 14th November, 2022 have inter alia considered and approved the businesses as per enclosed disclosure.

data.caption: Financial Results For Quarter Ended 30/06/2022.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosures Requirements) Regulations, 2015 as amended from time to time, we wish to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e. Friday, 12th August, 2022 have inter alia considered and approved the Un-Audited Standalone Financial Results along with the Limited Review Report issued by the Statutory Auditors M/s G. S. Mathur & Co, Chartered Accountants for the Quarter ended 30th June, 2022, which have been duly reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee.

The Board meeting commenced at 04:00 PM IST and concluded at 05:00 PM IST.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions - 31/03/2022.

data.news_body: Pursuant to the Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosures Requirements) Regulations, 2015 as amended from time to time, we wish to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e. Thursday, 14th October, 2021 have inter alia, considered and approved the matters as per the disclosure filed.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for OUTCOME OF BOARD MEETING HELD ON SATURDAY, 14TH AUGUST, 2021 AND SUBMISSION OF UN-AUDITED STANDALONE FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE QUARTER ENDED 30TH JUNE, 2021
data.news_body:
We wish to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e. Saturday, August 14, 2021 have inter alia, considered and approved the following matters

(a) A copy of the Un-Audited Standalone Financial Statements for the Quarter ended 30th June, 2021.

(b) Limited Review Report on the Un-Audited Standalone Financial Statements for the Quarter ended 30th June, 2021 issued by the Statutory Auditors, M/s G. S. Mathur & Co, Chartered Accountants.

The Board has considered and approved to convene 28th Annual General Meeting of the members of the Company on Monday, 27th September, 2021 at 03:00 PM IST through Video Conferencing or Other Audio Visual Means as permitted. The Board has also approved the Notice of 28th Annual General Meeting, Board of Directors Report, Corporate Governance Report and Management Discussion and Analysis Report for the financial year 2020-21.

data.caption: RESULTS FOR THE QUARTER ENDED 30TH JUNE, 2021
data.news_body:
we wish to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e. Saturday, August 14, 2021 have inter alia, considered and approved the following matters:

(a) A copy of the Un-Audited Standalone Financial Statements for the Quarter ended 30th June, 2021.

(b) Limited Review Report on the Un-Audited Standalone Financial Statements for the Quarter ended 30th June, 2021 issued by the Statutory Auditors, M/s G. S. Mathur & Co, Chartered Accountants.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions For The Half Year Ended 31/03/2021.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of SEBI LODR Regulations, 2015 as amended from time to time, we are submitting herewith details of Related Party Transactions on a consolidated basis for the Half Year period ended 31st March, 2021.

data.caption: Addendum To The Financial Results For The Fourth Quarter And The Financial Year Ended 31St March, 2021.
data.news_body: In continuation of our letter dated 31st May, 2021 for filing of Outcome of Board Meeting and Financial Results for the Fourth Quarter and the Financial Year ended 31st March, 2021, we hereby submitting Addendum in respect of Auditors Report on the Audited Standalone Financial Statements for the Fourth Quarter and also for the Financial Year ended on 31st March, 2021 issued by the Statutory Auditors, M/s G. S. Mathur & Co, Chartered Accountants as per the format specified under Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosures Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For 31/03/2021.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosures Requirements) Regulations, 2015 as amended from time to time, we wish to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e. Monday, 31st May, 2021 have inter alia, considered and approved the following matters:

Approval of the Audited Standalone Financial Statements for the Fourth Quarter and also for the Financial Year ended on 31st March, 2021 along with Auditors Report issued by the Statutory Auditors M/s G. S. Mathur & Co, Chartered Accountants which have been duly reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee.

The Board meeting commenced at 02.00 PM IST and concluded at 03.00 PM IST.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Dated 31/05/2021.

Pursuant to the Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosures Requirements) Regulations, 2015 as amended from time to time, we wish to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e. Monday, 31st May, 2021 have inter alia, considered and approved the matters as disclosed in the attachment.
